auto_merge.commit_message:
Problem:  not easily possible to complete from register content
Solution: add register-completion submode using i_CTRL-X_CTRL-R
          (glepnir)

closes: vim/vim#17354

https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/0546068aaef2b1a40faa2945ef7eba249739f219
auto_merge.commit_title: vim-patch:9.1.1408: not easily possible to complete from register content (#34198)

body:
Problem:  not easily possible to complete from register content
Solution: add register-completion submode using i_CTRL-X_CTRL-R
          (glepnir)

closes: vim/vim#17354

https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/0546068aaef2b1a40faa2945ef7eba249739f219

comment_data.body: Missing `// Skip invalid or black hole register` comment
Missing `// Add the word to the completion list` comment

comment_regular_data.body:
This loops infinitely if a register contains a null byte, repro:

```
$ printf "hello\0world\0" | nvim --clean -
cc
<C-X><C-R>
```
